Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • calpolar - Perform polarimetry processing of calibrated data.
  • comparesets - Compare spectra at different waveplate positions.
  • pcombine - Combine flux calibrated datasets.
  • plbias - Correct linear polarization for bias in Q and U
  • polave - Average Stokes spectra from multiple datasets.
  • polbin - Rebin Stokes and polarization spectra.
  • polcalc - Calculate polarization from Stokes IQUV spectra.
  • polnorm - Normalize Stokes QUV spectra by Stokes I.
  • polplot - Stacked plot of flux and polarization spectra.

  • (Type "help spec_polar opt=sys" for more information about the
  • spec_polar package and FOS polarimetry datasets.)
